UDialog Class Reference

UDialog is a simple interface to the Unix dialog program by Savio Lam and Stuart Herbert. I think dialog is an awesome way of building simple user interfaces. More...

Detailed Description

UDialog is a simple interface to the Unix dialog program by Savio Lam and Stuart Herbert. I think dialog is an awesome way of building simple user interfaces.
